discussion.title: Manim Animation PySR
discussion.body:
Hello Miles Cranmer,

absolutely great Python Package, thanks for doing it open source!

Do you have the code for the animation from pysr_animation.mp4, if its written in Manim. It looks beautiful! I want to adapt it to my pysr use-case. ðŸ˜„ 

Thanks a lot!

nodes.body: Yes! The animation is open-source too :) https://github.com/MilesCranmer/pysr_paper - the manim source is in the animation folder.
